DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of two serogroup B meningococcal vaccines in comparison to placebo administered to healthy adolescents ages 11 to 18 years.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Safety and Immune Response of Two Serogroup B Meningococcal Vaccines Administered to Healthy Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adolescents between and including 1118 years of age, who provide written informed consent. Previous or suspected disease caused by N. meningitidis; or previous immunization with a serogroup B meningococcal vaccine; Any acute, chronic or progressive disease.
